title: Amazing Drones
tagline: Building a drone with autoilot and awesomeness for taking candy from babies.

blocks.content: This is incorect gramer. Our robot automatically scans and maps out a specefied area and then creates a 3D model for use. We want to use this model for all sorts of useful and amazing things like curing cancer and creating world peace. Thank you for reading this I hope you enjoyed it. Oh and also don't forget to support me on paetreon or kickstarer or indegogow wait no not indiegogo it is litterally the scum of the earth when it comes to startups.
